name: Wishes (K&L)
description:
Each life is matter by constant, but only you make your own decisions that determine your path

☆ ☆ ☆

It was my 21th birthday and we decided to make a small game, that determines the feeling of making birthday wishes. 

The point is to show how important to make the right decisions and wishes in your life, so life gets better. Sometimes things don't go the way you want though, but you need to get everything from your troubles and misfortunes for it to work in your future.

So, the game makes you think about how to get through your teenage life and get to an adulthood. Seems easy, but everything depends on you. 

There is no right nor wrong decisions, cause life is about making mistakes, but you need to understand consequences of them.

☆ ☆ ☆

Controls:

  • LM (Left Mouse Click)
  • Mouse Hover to read the description of objects

Game developers:  KL

Art:  satacat

Coding:  kndratova
